i.name: Flurry
i.description: After Lee Sin uses an ability, his next 2 basic attacks gain Attack Speed and return Energy.

q.name: Sonic Wave / Resonating Strike
q.description:
Sonic Wave: Lee Sin projects a discordant wave of sound to locate his enemies, dealing physical damage to the first enemy it encounters. If Sonic Wave hits, Lee Sin can cast Resonating Strike for the next 3 seconds.
Resonating Strike: Lee Sin dashes to the enemy hit by Sonic Wave, dealing physical damage based on the target's missing Health.

w.name: Safeguard / Iron Will
w.description:
Safeguard: Lee Sin rushes to target ally, shielding himself from damage. If the ally is a champion, they are also shielded. After using Safeguard, Lee Sin can cast Iron Will for the next 3 seconds.
Iron Will: Lee Sin's intense training allows him to thrive in battle. For 4 seconds, Lee Sin gains Life Steal and Spell Vamp.

e.name: Tempest / Cripple
e.description:
Tempest: Lee Sin smashes the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage and reveals enemy units hit. If Tempest hits an enemy, Lee Sin can cast cripple for the next 3 seconds.
Cripple: Lee Sin cripples nearby enemies damaged by Tempest, reducing their Movement Speed for 4 seconds. Movement Speed recovers gradually over the duration.

r.name: Dragon's Rage
r.description: Lee Sin performs a powerful roundhouse kick launching his target back, dealing physical damage to the target and any enemies they collide with. Enemies the target collides with are knocked into the air for a short duration. This technique was taught to him by Jesse Perring, although Lee Sin does not kick players off the map.

i1.name: Flurry
i1.blurb: After Lee Sin uses an ability, his next 2 basic attacks gain 40% Attack Speed and return 20/10 Energy.
i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} After using an ability, '''Lee Sin's''' next 2 [[basic attack]]s within 3 seconds gain {{sti|attack speed|{{as|40% '''bonus''' attack speed}}}}, returning {{tip|energy|{{as|{{pp|3|20 to 40|1 to 13}} energy}}}} on the first attack and {{ft|half of that|{{sti|energy|{{as|{{pp|3|10 to 20|1 to 13}} energy}}}}}} on the second.

* ''Flurry'' will still restore energy even if the attacks are {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodged}}, {{ai|Riposte|Fiora|parried}}, {{ai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon|blocked}}, or if ''Lee Sin'' is {{tip|blind|blinded}}.

r1.name: Dragon's Rage
r1.blurb: Lee Sin performs a powerful roundhouse kick launching his target back, dealing physical damage to the target and any enemies they collide with. Enemies the target collides with are knocked into the air for a short duration. This technique was taught to him by Jesse Perring, although Lee Sin does not kick players off the map.
r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lee Sin''' instantly {{tip|root|roots}} the target enemy champion for {{tt|{{fd|0.25}}|Estimated}} seconds after which he roundhouse kicks them dealing {{as|physical damage}} and {{tip|airborne|knocking them back}} 1200 units over 1 second.
r1.description2: Enemies hit by the displaced enemy receive {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} and are {{tip|airborne|knocked up}} for 1 second.
r1.leveling2: {{st|Collision Damage|{{ap|150 to 600 3}} {{as|(+ 200% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ {{ap|12 to 18 3}}% of kicked target's '''bonus''' health)}}}}
notes: * If ''Dragon's Rage's'' target dies when first hit there will be no displacement of any kind.

** The {{tip|airborne|displacement's}} direction is decided at the moment of impact and not by ''Lee Sin'' and his target's relative locations on-cast (the only way for ''Lee Sin'' to control where his target is displaced is by using {{si|Flash}} before ''Dragon's Rage's'' cast time ends).
* ''Dragon's Rage'' applies {{tip|single target}} spell effect to the main target and {{tip|area of effect}} to enemies hit by the main-target-projectile.
* The ability will go on cooldown after dealing its damage.
** Because of this, if {{ri|Electrocute}} procs from the root and kills the enemy the ability will not go on cooldown.
